li.label: Pack broken
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has had a painful life, over and over again every pack they join has been destroyed, [PAWN_nameDef] has been so scarred by the repeated loss of their pack that they refuse to let themselves join another, even if otherwise willing.

li.label: Avali (Transavalist/Fears fire)
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an avali who fears fire and will not fight it, due to their natural fear of heat. They also like bionic body parts.

li.label: Avali (Transavalist)
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an avali who will fight fire, and also would like a bionic body part. Or two. Or three. Or four.

li.label: Avali (Purist)
li.description: Unlike most avali, [PAWN_nameDef] doesn't like bionic enhancements. Odd, right? The other avali think so too.

li.label: Avali (Purist/fears fire)
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a fear of fire and bionic body parts, for some reason. I wonder if the other avali talk behind their back.

li.label: Avali
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] does not care if they have bionic body parts or not. They just want to be a happy avali.
